sellerCard.description:
Greetings,
Are You looking for talented and professional designer who will meet all deadlines with quality designs and Social marketing services won't disappear when needed ? Then you are at right place to fulfil your requirements. I'm a professional Graphic designer with 7+ years experience.  I get immense pleasure helping businesses with their design requirements. I really enjoy assisting individuals in developing their identity and providing them with a beautiful yet professional appearance.

description.content:
Welcome to my professional service!


I specialize in creating top-quality WordPress website and eCommerce stores. Your business deserves a powerful online presence to capture leads and foster growth, and I ensure this with modern, responsive, and fully customized websites.


Advantage include:

  • Tailored WordPress sites
  • eCommerce functionality
  • Contemporary themes
  • Cutting-edge designs
  • Complete branding
  • Responsive, fast, and SEO-optimized
  • Customized forms, landing pages and single-page sites
  • Expertise in Elementor Builder and payment integrations


Customer satisfaction is my priority! For custom projects, let's discuss before placing an order.


feel free to reach out with any queries.


Proficient | eCommerce | Shopify | Responsive | Optimized | WordPress


If you have a specific existing design in your mind so do let me know, i can design a custom website using Figma or Adobe XD as Well

openGraph.title: develop wordpress website design with responsive web design

reviews.comment: It was just a lack of understanding and a likely language barrier. If we had had a meeting via Zoom (consultation) before Raff started working on the website, it might have gone better.  Upwork does it that way, but unfortunately, Fiverr does not.

We agreed on 14 days work, it end up being more or a less a month. Maybe he took more work than he could manage. Overall we completed the work. But I many things were left out so I opted to end the process as it was.

Overall, we were disappointed by the result. We admit we could have sent one more round of feedback to Raff. However, we had previously created a word document with all the changes listed and these points were only partially taken into consideration.
Definitely find some else. Slow, first listen or doesnt understand. Its like he just didnt try hard and I way over paid
Brilliant website that's easy to edit. Even after it was delivered we needed some help and it was done with no problem. Highly recommended
